issue.title: [CF 708] [Multi-state Cooldown] Hide if default
issue.body:
Look into adding an option to multi-state cooldown icons that will allow users to hide the icon if the spell being tracked is in its default state (which would allow people to hide an icon for Dark Simulacrum unless something has been stolen, for example.)


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras | Imported from CurseForge issue #708 | Raw

comments.body:
In case this is based on actual player request / problem-solving need, just a suggestion for Dark Simulacrum specifically. You can set a Condition for the icon:

Buff Duration
player
Dark Simulacrum
~= 0 (ie, Not Absent)

Because stealing a spell with DSim puts a buff on you ("Dark Simulacrum") for the duration of the stolen spell, this will always hide the icon if DSim has not stolen anything.


> Posted by CurseForge user Lov3star

You. I like you. Now I know what to tell people every time they ask me this.
